subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Scott Dixon, followed by Charlie Kimball and Dario Franchitti, led a podium sweep for Chip Ganassi Racing in IndyCar’s first race at Pocono since 1989.
snippet: Scott Dixon, followed by Charlie Kimball and Dario Franchitti, led a podium sweep for Chip Ganassi Racing in IndyCar’s first race at Pocono since 1989.
